Paragraph.Text: Bulk freight transit for Gas canisters.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Max Speed: Max Storage: Acceleration: Accepted Freight:
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: 1m/s 1000 0.5m/s/s Compressed Sulphur Compressed Chlorine Compressed Freezon Canister

Paragraphs.Paragraph: Gas freighters are high capacity freight carts. Unlike their conventional variants they can only carry one item type at a time and it must be a type of harvestable Gas.>
